title: We Are Newcastle United
overview: The series tells the inside-story of Newcastle's expectation-defying 2022-23 season which culminated in qualification for the UEFA Champions League. It is narrated by Newcastle's all-time leading goalscorer Alan Shearer and offers a â€˜unique insight into the club's ongoing evolution under head coach Eddie Howe, offering exclusive access to the club's decision makers and following the Magpies' ongoing 2022-23 season from close quarters.
